header.title: Adam Saks oaččui Gudnistipeandda - Norgga Gonagasviessu

body.p: Odne eahkes addojuvvui Kjell Nupen Memorial Grant vuosttaš geardde. Majestehta Dronnet Sonja lei stipeandda juohkimis fárus Londonis.

p.em: - What better way to honor my friend and mentor than to give the Kjell Nupen Memorial Grant to an artist he praised and appreciated?

body.p: Kjell Nupen lei son guhte dagai Adam Saks dovddusin stivrii ja evttohii su oažžut The Queen Sonja Print Award 2014:s. Eahkes beasai ge Dronnet Sonja presenteret su vuosttaš olmmožin guhte beasai vuostáiváldi Kjell Nupen Muitostipeandda:

p.em: - Tonight’s artist is Danish and trained at the Royal Danish Academy of Fine Arts in Copenhagen, and Berlin University of the Arts.

He is highly accomplished, and works with a great variety of printmaking techniques. His art span from bold and colourful woodcuts to more delicate and tender etchings. The artistic style is distinctive and lies in the tension between the figurative and abstraction. His works often have an ambiguous narrative, and they are indeed wonderful – some of which you can see for yourselves in this hall.
(…) I hope you will assist me when we now give the grant and the diploma to the first recipient of The Kjell Nupen Memorial Grant: Adam Saks.

body.p: Juohkin lei almmuhuvvon ovdalaš dán čavčča, Kjell Nupen riegádanbeaivvi čakčamánu 5. beaivvi. Muitostipendii gullá dat ahte beassá vuolgit muhtun áigái bargat Universal Limited Art Editions (ULAE) dáiddárbáikái ja oažžu 50 000 norgga ruvnno stipeandan.

Juohkindilálašvuohta lei RIBA - the Royal Institute of British Architects lanjain, gos maiddái Statkraft 120-jagi ávvudilálašvuohta lei odne. Dronnet čuovui dien dilálašvuođa maid, gos lei earet eará fágaseminára ja panelaságastallan ruoná energiija birra.

Dát stipeanda ásahuvvui 2014 čavčča, dáiddár Kjell Nupenii muitun, gii jámii njukčamánu 12. beaivvi 2014. Dat galgá juogaduvvo juohke nuppi jagi muhtun davviriikkalaš dáiddárii gii lea gráfalaš dáiddasuorggis dahkan mearkkašahtti barggu, ja dat juogaduvvui vuosttaš gearddi dán jagi.

Stipeanda lea ovttasbargu mas leat fárus Queen Sonja Art Foundation ja measttirdeaddeleaddji Bill Goldston, Universal Limited Art Editions New York. Lea Queen Sonja Art Foundation stivra mii vállje vuoiti, ja dat galgá almmuhuvvot Kjell Nupena riegádanbeaivvi čakčamánu 5. beaivvi.
